html:
** Private equity firm 3I Group PLC III.L up 4.8% at a record high of 1,430.5p

** Co records total return of 2.2 bln stg, or 24%, on opening shareholders' funds in HY, vs 1.14 bln stg, or 15%, a year earlier

** Co among top gainers on FTSE 100 .FTSE index

** Competition for private assets remains very strong - CEO

** Stock sees its highest single-day pct rise in 4 months

** Co's discount retailer Action surpasses expectations, posting a 25% jump to 4.8 bln stg in 9-mth period

** Including session gains, co shares are up 23.5% YTD vs FTSE 100 index which is up 14%


(Reporting by Muhammed Husain)

(( muhammed.husain@thomsonreuters.com ))
